version_description:
* Now you can continue the game from the same spot if you loose, no more checkpoints!
* New heart system, use the heart to revive in the levels!
* New level: Wild West

* Now you can continue the game from the same spot if you loose, no more checkpoints!
* New heart system, use the heart to revive in the levels!
* New level: Wild West

- Challenge the new most difficult level so far: Disco!
- New way to unlock levels. Use Keys to unlock any level you want!
- Special time limited offer for World Cup, unlock the soccer ball and get goodies!

- Explore the world of dinosaurs in new exciting level : Jurassic!
- Complete the missions, open chests and get more rewards!

- Check out the Luckybox! Take your chance and win free gifts in the Luckybox!
- You can now use Coins to resume the game from checkpoints. You can still use Hearts to revive instantly!

- Check out the Luckybox! Take your chance and win free gifts in the Luckybox!
- You can now use Coins to resume the game from checkpoints. You can still use Hearts to revive instantly!
Join the event. Collect golden keys. Unlock the new level Despacito!

* New level : Primal, explore the dark jungle and avoid traps to escape from the mighty ape!
* New improved game experience, enjoy!

* New level : Primal, explore the dark jungle and avoid traps to escape from the mighty ape!
* New improved game experience, enjoy!

****Update****
Due to the expiration of the copyright, the level Despacito has been removed, and players who have already purchased can retain this level.
